welcomeEmail.title: Welcome
welcomeEmail.paragraph: In the following link you can access to the Backoffice organization with yours credentials
welcomeEmail.paragraph2: in the first login you must change your password

welcomeUserEmail.title: Welcome
welcomeUserEmail.paragraph2: To complete your registration on the platform you will need to change your password.

publishedProjectEmail.title: Published Project!
publishedProjectEmail.paragraph2: has been published. You can check all the details of the publication website in the following link.

resetPasswordEmail.title: Reset password
resetPasswordEmail.paragraph: You have requested to reset your password. Click the following link to choose a new password.
resetPasswordEmail.paragraph2: If you have not requested to reset your password you can ignore and delete this message.
